content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': 'This reminds you of these events from your past: \nAs per my latest command, I executed a Google search for reviews of Qalam wa Lawh, International House Madrid, and Berlitz language schools. The search returned several links, including those from pmi.org, uecmovies.com, and perimeter.org. I used the "browse_website" command to visit Google and search for reputable websites with reviews of language schools. Previously, I had used "list_files" to find an image summarizing my language school options at "/home/atlas/autogpt/auto_gpt_workspace/274e0285-b50e-4f43-9823-97c6c368e043.jpg".'}
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[{'role': 'your computer', 'content': "Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: The text does not provide information about reputable websites that have reviews of language schools. It primarily discusses Google's use of cookies and data for various purposes, including providing and managing services, measuring audience engagement, and displaying personalized content and ads. It also provides links to Google's privacy tools and terms and conditions. \n \n Links: ['zde (https://www.google.com/?output=search&gbv=1&sei=TK5mZMe9MuOB0PEPpauxwAs)', 'Gmail (https://mail.google.com/mail/&ogbl)', 'Obrázky (https://www.google.cz/imghp?hl=cs&ogbl)', ' (https://www.google.cz/intl/cs/about/products)', 'Přihlásit (https://accounts.google.com/ServiceLogin?hl=cs&passive=true&continue=https://www.google.com/&ec=GAZAmgQ)']"}, {'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "get_hyperlinks", "args": {"url": "https://www.google.com/search?q=reviews+of+Qalam+wa+Lawh,+International+House+Madrid,+and+Berlitz+language+schools&oq=reviews+of+Qalam+wa+Lawh,+International+House+Madrid,+and+Berlitz+language+schools&aqs=chrome.0.35i39l2j0l4j46j69i60.1125j1j7&sourceid=chrome&ie=UTF-8", "question": "What are some websites that have reviews of language schools?"}}}'}]
"""
